comments.body: Just a quick question for my understanding. What is this method trying to achieve? Replace '_' to '-' keys in `user_device` parameter?

Yes it is to convert the underscores (from ansible) to hyphens (in our Fortios REST API). Unfortunately our REST API uses hyphens everywhere and we got a comment from one of the reviewers that we must replace hyphens by underscores in Ansible attributes. Hence the need of the method. Every underscore is replaced by a hyphen before calling our REST API.
